fields.title: PersonSerializer by YAML
fields.sample_yaml:
main:
  name: PersonSerializerByYAML
  fields:
  - name: first_name
    field: CharField
  - name: last_name
    field: CharField
  - name: age
    field: IntegerField
  - name: email
    field: EmailField
  - name: sex
    field: definable_serializer.extra_fields.RadioField
    field_args:
    - - - male
        - Male
      - - other
        - Other
      - - female
        - Female
    field_kwargs:
      allow_blank: false
      allow_null: false
      initial: other
      inline: true
  - name: type
    field: definable_serializer.extra_fields.ChoiceRequiredField
    field_args:
    - - - 
        - '--------------'
      - - family
        - Family
      - - friend
        - Friend
      - - other
        - Other
    field_kwargs:
      allow_blank: false
      allow_null: false
  - name: memo
    field: CharField
    field_kwargs:
      required: false
      max_length: 100
      style:
        base_template: textarea.html
        rows: 5
        placeholder: Hello everyone!

fields.title: AllFieldSerializer by YAML
fields.sample_yaml:
main:
  name: AllFieldSerializerByYAML
  fields:
  - name: boolean_field
    field: BooleanField
  - name: nullboolean_field
    field: NullBooleanField
  - name: text_field
    field: definable_serializer.extra_fields.TextField
    field_kwargs:
      rows: 15
      placeholder: Hi. I'm pleaseholder! Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing
        elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.
  - name: char_field
    field: CharField
  - name: email_field
    field: EmailField
  - name: regex_field
    field: RegexField
    field_args:
    - a-zA-Z0-9
  - name: slug_field
    field: SlugField
  - name: url_field
    field: URLField
  - name: uuid_field
    field: UUIDField
  - name: filepath_field
    field: FilePathField
    field_args: /
  - name: ipaddress_field
    field: IPAddressField
  - name: integer_field
    field: IntegerField
  - name: decimal_field
    field: DecimalField
    field_kwargs:
      max_digits: 5
      decimal_places: 2
  - name: datetime_field
    field: DateTimeField
  - name: date_field
    field: DateField
  - name: time_field
    field: TimeField
  - name: duration_field
    field: DurationField
  - name: duration_field
    field: DurationField
  - name: choice_field
    field: ChoiceField
    field_args:
    - - - 1
        - choice_one
      - - 2
        - choice_two
      - - 3
        - choice_three
  - name: non_nullable_choice_field
    field: definable_serializer.extra_fields.ChoiceWithBlankField
    field_args:
    - - - ''
        - '---- Please choice 💖---'
      - - 1
        - choice_one
      - - 2
        - choice_two
      - - 3
        - choice_three
  - name: multiple_choice_field
    field: MultipleChoiceField
    field_args:
    - - - 1
        - choice_one
      - - 2
        - choice_two
      - - 3
        - choice_three
  - name: radio_field
    field: definable_serializer.extra_fields.RadioField
    field_args:
    - - - one
        - One(1)
      - - two
        - Two(2)
      - - three
        - Three(3)
  - name: radio_field_inline
    field: definable_serializer.extra_fields.RadioField
    field_args:
    - - - one
        - One(1)
      - - two
        - Two(2)
      - - three
        - Three(3)
    field_kwargs:
      inline: true
  - name: file_field
    field: FileField
  - name: image_field
    field: ImageField
  - name: json_field
    field: JSONField
  - name: hidden_field
    field: HiddenField
    field_kwargs:
      default: Hoi!
  - name: readonly_field
    field: ReadOnlyField

fields.title: GroupSerializer(Depending Person Serializer) by YAML
fields.sample_yaml:
main:
  name: GroupSerializerByYAML
  fields:
  - name: group_name
    field: CharField
    field_kwargs:
      label: Group name
      required: true
      help_text: Please enter group name
  - name: person_list
    field: PersonSerializer
    field_kwargs:
      many: true
depending_serializers:
- name: PersonSerializer
  fields:
  - name: username_field
    field: CharField
    field_kwargs:
      label: Username
      required: true
      initial: ''
  - name: email_field
    field: EmailField
    field_kwargs:
      label: Email
      required: true
      initial: ''

fields.title: Using Validator classes By YAML
fields.sample_yaml:
main:
  name: UsingValidator
  fields:
  - name: hello_only_field
    field: CharField
    field_kwargs:
      style:
        placeholder: '...'
    validators:
    - validator: definable_serializer.tests.test_serializers.CorrectDataValidator
      args:
      - hello
  - name: goodbye_only_field
    field: CharField
    field_kwargs:
      style:
        placeholder: '...'
    validators:
    - validator: definable_serializer.tests.test_serializers.CorrectDataValidator
      args:
      - goodbye

fields.title: internationalization test By YAML
fields.sample_yaml:
main:
  name: FirstSurvey
  fields:
  - name: test_field
    field: CharField
    field_kwargs:
      initial:
        default: initial_default
        ja: initial_ja
      label:
        default: test_field_label_default
        ja: test_field_label_ja
      help_text:
        default: test_field_help_text_default
        ja: test_field_help_text_ja

  - name: gendar_field
    field: ChoiceField
    field_args:
    - - - male
        - default: gendar_field_choice_male_default
          ja: gendar_field_choice_male_ja
      - - female
        - default: gendar_field_choice_female_default
          ja: gendar_field_choice_female_ja
      - - other
        - default: gendar_field_choice_other_default
          ja: gendar_field_choice_other_ja
    field_kwargs:
      label:
        default: gendar_field_label_default
        ja: gendar_field_label_ja
      help_text:
        default: gendar_field_help_text_default
        ja: gendar_field_help_text_ja
      initial: male

  - name: filepath_field
    field: FilePathField
    field_kwargs:
      path: /
      label:
        default: filepath_field_label_default
        ja: filepath_field_label_ja
      help_text:
        default: filepath_field_help_text_default
        ja: filepath_field_help_text_ja

fields.title: PersonSerializer by JSON  definition
AllFieldSerializer by JSON definition
MultipleSerializer field in SingleObject
fields.sample_one:
main:
  name: TestSerializerForYAML
  fields:
  - name: test_field
    field: CharField
